name: Smashcast blue night mode
description: Using colors close to Smashcast's blue, affects most everything.
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.smashcast.tv") {
body,
a,
.nav-links__link,
chat-button .chat-button .htbx-icon,
.main-nav__item .htbx-icon,
.htbx-button-show-more .htbx-icon,
.media-list__items .t-name,
.media-list__items .t-status a,
.dropdown-menu>li>a,
.navigation__item__link,
.main-nav-search__header .button-close .htbx-icon,
.main-nav-search__input,
.layout a,
.esport-scores__team,
.button--outline,
.button--variant-outline,
.box__text-input.disabled,
.datepicker__presets span,
div.datepicker th,
div.datepicker a,
.highcharts-series-hover,
input,
.video-editor .meta textarea,
.video-manager__list__col-3,
.chat-input .public-DraftEditorPlaceholder-root,
.chat-input__input,
.chat-input__login,
.dash__input__input,
.commercial-break-settings__card1__button__plus-minus {
    color: #ccc;
}
.main-nav__item--language-select__abbr {
    background-color: #eb5055
}
.detail-page--is-desktop .detail-page__chat,
.detail-page--is-desktop .detail-page__chat *,
.detail-sidebar__user,
.main-nav,
article.feed-item,
.browse-channels--recommended,
.main-nav-search,
.content-nav--variant-default,
.esports-media--status-future .esports-media__content,
#date-range #date-range-field,
div.datepicker table.datepickerViewDays,
div.datepicker table.datepickerViewMonths,
div.datepicker table.datepickerViewYears,
body,
.chat-input__input-wrapper,
.commercial-break-settings__card1 {
    background-color: #182436;
}
.nav-search-btn,
.main-nav__item,
.nav-links__link:focus,
.esports-media__link:focus,
.esports-media__link:hover,
.btn:hover,
div.datepicker a:hover,
.input-group__addon {
    color: white
}
.detail-page,
.browse-channels--following,
.browse-channels--following-vods,
.language-menu,
.main-nav-search__content,
.user-menu,
.browse,
.layout,
.esports-media__content,
.box,
tags-input .tags,
.chat-blacklist-settings__tags .tags .input,
div.datepicker,
div.datepicker a:hover,
.input-group__addon,
.dashboard__chat__mod-settings,
.chat-scrollwrapper,
chat-buttons .chat-buttons__button-row,
chat-buttons .chat-buttons__tab-content {
    background-color: #22334C
}
.poll-feed-item__answer,
input,
.colR textarea {
    background-color: #262C36
}
.poll-feed-item__answer__bar__inner {
    background-color: #3B4454
}
.content-nav--variant-default {
    margin-bottom: 1px;
}
.layout--variant-settings .layout__wrapper {
    margin-top: 1px;
}
.settings-content section .select2-container,
.settings-content section input,
.settings-content section textarea,
.btn,
body.dashboard,
htbx-studio-dashboard-actions-settings,
htbx-studio-dashboard-stream-settings,
.formL {
    background-color: #22334c;
    color: #ccc
}
.dash__column--column-actions .dash__column__header,
.dash__column--column-stream-actions .dash__column__header,
.dash__column--column-stream .dash__column__header,
.dash__column--column-actions .dash__column__footer,
.dash__column--column-stream-actions .dash__column__footer,
.dash__column--column-stream .dash__column__footer {
    background: transparent linear-gradient(180deg, #eb5055 20%, transparent)
}
}
